usefulItems: plate, bowl, pastry brush, large bowl
title: Lamb cutlets with pumpkin and pistachio salad

ingredients.content: ¼ tsp ground cumin, plus extra for sprinkling
¼ tsp ground smoked paprika, plus extra for sprinkling
2 pinches salt, plus extra for sprinkling
2 pinches ground black pepper, plus extra for sprinkling
400 g pumpkin, peeled and cut into cubes (2 cm)
1 avocado, flesh only, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place pistachios into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer onto a plate and set aside.
Place garlic and mint into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add yoghurt, cumin, paprika, salt and pepper and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Rinse mixing bowl.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh pumpkin into it. Add 2 teaspoons of the oil to pumpkin and toss to coat.

Place lamb onto Varoma tray and brush with remaining 2 teaspoons oil. Sprinkle with extra cumin, paprika, salt and pepper to season. Insert Varoma tray with seasoned lamb, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Stir pumpkin and turn lamb cutlets to ensure even cooking. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>6-8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> or until lamb is cooked to your liking. Remove Varoma and set aside to cool for approx. 3-5 minutes. Dip 1 side of each cutlet into the reserved yoghurt dressing, then into the reserved chopped pistachios and transfer onto a plate.

Place spinach, capers, tomatoes, avocado and steamed pumpkin into a large bowl and toss to combine. Sprinkle with remaining chopped pistachios, then serve with lamb cutlets and remaining yoghurt dressing.

hintsAndTricks: You can trim the cutlets yourself, but most butchers will do it for you.
